issue.title: [Bug] Untranslated string appear on dialog for "You have changed the data deletion settings. Please save them before starting a purge."
issue.body:
### What happened?

In privacy settings, and you change the value of "Regularly delete old raw data" and do not save it, and then click the Purge DB Now link at "Schedule old data deletion", you get an dialog with an untranslated confirm button ({{ TRANSLATE('GENERAL_OK') }}).

### What should happen?

The Ok button should have translated text.

### How can this be reproduced?

Go to privacy settings in th admin area, change the Regularly delete old raw data to a new value without saving. Click Purge DB Now.

### Matomo version

5.2.1

### PHP version

8.2.26

### Server operating system

_No response_
